lead_paragraph: Departing Bayern Munich coach Pep Guardiola has been assured a bittersweet farewell at the German club with the pending celebration of a record fourth straight Bundesliga title soured by another failure to shine on the European stage.

headline.print_headline: Europe Remained a Bridge Too Far for Guardiola's Bayern
headline.main: Europe Remained a Bridge Too Far for Guardiola's Bayern

snippet: Departing Bayern Munich coach Pep Guardiola has been assured a bittersweet farewell at the German club with the pending celebration of a record fourth straight Bundesliga title soured by another failure to shine on the European stage....
